meanings.definition: Extremely small in size, too small to be seen with a standard microscope.
meanings.sent1: The ultramicroscopic dust particles floated in the air, invisible to the naked eye.
meanings.sent2: Scientists used an ultramicroscopic lens to study the tiny organisms in the water sample.
meanings.sent3: The ultramicroscopic ants were so small that they could sneak into the picnic basket unnoticed.
meanings.sent4: Her ultramicroscopic attention to detail made her the best detective in town.
meanings.sent5: The ultramicroscopic stars twinkled faintly in the vast night sky.
